title: kink~
description: The `kink~` object distorts a `phasor~` signal by applying a non-linear bend or "kink" to its phase. It takes a phase input and a slope, modifying the output based on whether the phase times the slope is above or below a 0.5 threshold. This results in a distorted phasor output, useful for various forms of phase modulation and waveshaping.
